009package Ch10_LineFitting;
010
011
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
014
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.gui.NewImage;
018import ij.gui.PointRoi;
019import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
020import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
021import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
023import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.line.utils.LineSampler;
024import imagingbook.common.geometry.line.AlgebraicLine;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
026import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
027import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogStringColumns;
028import imagingbook.common.ij.RoiUtils;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
031import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
032
033/**
034 * Samples points on a given (ideal) line and creates a new image with 
035 * the sample points contained in a {@link PointRoi}.
036 * Image size, circle parameters and noise can be specified.
037 * The result can be used as a test image for line fitting.
038 * 
039 * @author WB
040 * @version 2022/10/03
041 */
042public class Line_Make_Random implements PlugIn {
043        
044        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<Line_Make_Random> {           
045                
046                @DialogLabel("image title")@DialogStringColumns(12)
047                public String Title = "RandomLine"; // Line_Make_Random.class.getSimpleName();
048                
049                @DialogLabel("image width")
050                public int W = 400;
051                @DialogLabel("image height")
052                public int H = 400;
053                
054                @DialogLabel("number of points")
055                public int n = 20;
056                
057                @DialogLabel("start point (x1)")
058                public double x1 = 90;
059                @DialogLabel("start point (y1)")
060                public double y1 = 40;
061                @DialogLabel("end point (x2)")
062                public double x2 = 300;
063                @DialogLabel("end point (y2)")
064                public double y2 = 270;
065                
066                @DialogLabel("x/y noise sigma")
067                public double sigma = 5.0;
068                
069                @DialogLabel("show real line")
070                public boolean ShowRealCurve = true;
071                @DialogLabel("line color")
072                public BasicAwtColor StrokeColor = BasicAwtColor.Green;
073                @DialogLabel("stroke width")
074                public double StrokeWidth = 1.0;
075        };
076        
077        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
078        
079        
080        @Override
081        public void run(String arg) {
082                
083                if (!runDialog()) {
084                        return;
085                }
086                
087                Pnt2d pStart = Pnt2d.from(params.x1, params.y1);
088                Pnt2d pEnd = Pnt2d.from(params.x2, params.y2);
089                AlgebraicLine realLine = AlgebraicLine.from(pStart, pEnd);
090                
091                LineSampler ls = new LineSampler(pStart, pEnd);
092                Pnt2d[] points = ls.getPoints(params.n, params.sigma);  
093                
094                ImagePlus im = NewImage.createByteImage(params.Title, params.W, params.H, 1, NewImage.FILL_BLACK);
095                im.setRoi(RoiUtils.toPointRoi(points));
096                
097                ImageProcessor ip = im.getProcessor();
098                for (Pnt2d p : points) {
099                        int u = (int) Math.rint(p.getX());
100                        int v = (int) Math.rint(p.getY());
101                        ip.putPixel(u, v, 255);
102                }
103                ip.invertLut();
104                
105                
106                if (params.ShowRealCurve) {
107                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
108                        ColoredStroke lineStroke = new ColoredStroke(params.StrokeWidth, params.StrokeColor.getColor());
109                        ola.addShape(realLine.getShape(params.W, params.H), lineStroke);
110                        im.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
111                }
112                
113                im.show();
114        }
115        
116        // ------------------------------------------
117        
118        private boolean runDialog() {
119                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
120                gd.addMessage(DialogUtils.makeLineSeparatedString(
121                                "This plugin samples points on a given (ideal) line and",
122                                "creates a new image with the sample points marked and also",
123                                "contained in a ROI (float coordinates)."
124                                ));
125                
126                addToDialog(params, gd);
127
128                gd.showDialog();
129                if (gd.wasCanceled())
130                        return false;
131                
132                getFromDialog(params, gd);
133                return params.validate();
134        }
135
136}
